DOC.brief_summary: In study hypothesize infusion Angiotensin II improve insulin-induced microvascular dilatation therefore insulin-mediated glucose uptake . Objectives : Does infusion Angiotensin II increase insulin-mediated glucose uptake via enhanced insulin-mediated microvascular function healthy subject ?
DOC.brief_title: Role Angiotensin II Insulin-induced Microvascular Activity
DOC.criteria: 1.1860 year 2.Caucasian 3.Blood pressure < 140/90 mmHg . 1 . Obesity ( BMI > 27kg/m2 ) 2 . Cardiovascular disease ( stroke , coronary artery disease , peripheral vascular disease , heart failure ) 3 . Impaired glucose tolerance diabetes mellitus accord criterion ADA 4 . Smoking 5 . Alcohol use > 4U/day 6 . Use medication ( antihypertensive drug , lipid lower drug , corticosteroid , NNSAIDs ) 7 . Pregnancy 8 . Wearing contact lens
